analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/44/0x87d7bb3bd48c5910584533348c801c6f571f012c.sol:
	Contract winecoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/44/0x87d7bb3bd48c5910584533348c801c6f571f012c.sol#208-210)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/44/0x87d7bb3bd48c5910584533348c801c6f571f012c.sol#78) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of winecoin.burn (/unique_chucks/44/0x87d7bb3bd48c5910584533348c801c6f571f012c.sol#212-213) is not in mixedCase
